pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Important Information for Guests of Whispering Terrace Rooms Casino Contacts 18+ Booking Disclaimer Whispering Terrace Casino-Hotel is dedicated to providing a luxurious and exciting entertainment experience for our guests. Located in the heart of Australia, our establishment offers a wide range of amenities and services to ensure an unforgettable stay for all visitors. As a premier destination for gaming and relaxation, we strive to create a safe and secure environment for everyone who walks through our doors. However, it is important to note that gambling can be addictive and may lead to financial loss. We urge all guests to gamble responsibly and set limits on their gaming activities. Our team at Whispering Terrace Casino-Hotel is committed to promoting responsible gambling practices and providing resources for those who may need assistance. If you or someone you know is struggling with a gambling addiction, please seek help from one of the many support services available in Australia. It is important to remember that gambling is a form of entertainment and should be enjoyed in moderation. Please do not wager more than you can afford to lose and take breaks from gaming to relax and refocus. Guests must be over the age of 18 to enter the casino premises. Identification may be required upon entry to verify age and identity. Minors are not permitted in the gaming areas or any other restricted sections of the property. Whispering Terrace Casino-Hotel promotes a safe and welcoming environment for all guests and staff. Any form of harassment, discrimination, or disruptive behavior will not be tolerated and may result in immediate removal from the premises. We expect all guests to treat others with respect and adhere to our code of conduct while on the property. The management of Whispering Terrace Casino-Hotel reserves the right to refuse service to anyone at their discretion. This includes individuals who are under the influence of drugs or alcohol, as well as those who exhibit disruptive or inappropriate behavior. We take the safety and wellbeing of our guests and staff seriously and will not hesitate to take appropriate action in order to maintain a secure environment. While we strive to provide a comfortable and enjoyable experience for all guests, Whispering Terrace Casino-Hotel is not liable for any personal belongings lost or damaged on the premises. We recommend that guests keep valuables secure and exercise caution while on the property. In the event of any disputes or disagreements, the management of Whispering Terrace Casino-Hotel will handle the situation in accordance with the laws of Australia. We are committed to resolving issues fairly and promptly to ensure the satisfaction of our guests. Thank you for choosing Whispering Terrace Casino-Hotel for your entertainment needs. We look forward to providing you with a memorable and enjoyable experience during your stay with us. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact our guest services team for assistance. 18+ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer +61 648 295 407 WhisperingTerrace@gmail.com 130 William St, Brisbane City QLD 4000, Australia

pages.policy: Your Privacy Matters: Read Whispering Terrace's Privacy Policy Rooms Casino Contacts 18+ Booking Privacy Policy At Whispering Terrace, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data when you visit our website or use our services at our casino-hotel. 1. Collection of Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as your name, address, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make a reservation or sign up for our loyalty program. We may also collect information about your preferences and interests to enhance your experience at our casino-hotel. 2. Use of Personal Information: We use your personal information to process reservations, provide customer service, and communicate with you about our services and promotions. We may use your information for marketing purposes to provide you with personalized offers and recommendations. Your personal information will not be sold or shared with third parties without your consent, except as required by law. 3. Protection of Personal Information: We have implemented security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. Your payment details are encrypted and securely processed to ensure the safety of your transactions. We regularly review and update our security protocols to maintain the confidentiality of your data. 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We may use cookies and tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience and gather information about your usage of our website. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect your ability to access certain features of our website. 5. Access to Your Information: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information in our records. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or the handling of your data, please contact us at WhisperingTerrace@gmail.com. By using our website or services, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as outlined in this Privacy Policy. We reserve the right to update this policy at any time, and we recommend checking this page for any changes. Last updated: 20 may 2023 Thank you for choosing Whispering Terrace Casino-Hotel. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal information. 18+ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer +61 648 295 407 WhisperingTerrace@gmail.com 130 William St, Brisbane City QLD 4000, Australia
pages.terms: Terms and Conditions: Your Guide to Booking at Whispering Terrace Rooms Casino Contacts 18+ Booking Terms and Conditions All guests must be 18 years of age or older to stay at Whispering Terrace. Guests must present a valid photo ID upon check-in. The use of illegal drugs is strictly prohibited on the premises of Whispering Terrace. Any guest found violating this policy will be asked to leave immediately and may be reported to the authorities. Smoking is only permitted in designated smoking areas within the casino-hotel. Any guest found smoking in a non-designated area will be charged a cleaning fee. Gambling at the casino is for entertainment purposes only. Guests are responsible for their own behavior and financial decisions while playing at the casino. Whispering Terrace is not responsible for any lost or stolen items during your stay. Guests are encouraged to use the in-room safe for valuables. Pets are not allowed at Whispering Terrace. Service animals are permitted with proper documentation. Any damages to hotel property will be charged to the guest's credit card on file. Quiet hours are observed from 11:00 PM to 7:00 AM. Guests are expected to respect the peace and privacy of other guests during these times. Management reserves the right to refuse service to any guest who is disruptive, violates hotel policies, or puts the safety of other guests and staff at risk. By staying at Whispering Terrace, guests agree to abide by these terms and conditions. Failure to comply may result in eviction from the premises without a refund. 18+ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer +61 648 295 407 WhisperingTerrace@gmail.com 130 William St, Brisbane City QLD 4000, Australia
